channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street sign stolen alongside bike, 19th January
item.description:
The parking sign has been stolen to access a bike and the thieves dug up the ground to remove the sign. There are bricks that are uneven and a trip hazard now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 105, Grove Park, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on tbe road near curb, 19th January
item.description:
Unfortunately there is a dead fox on a road (close to the curb) near the crossing of Somerhill Road (DA161PE) and Kenmere Road. Could please someone collect it? Im not sure how long it's been there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerhill Road, Welling, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipping Near Franklin Place 5, 19th January
item.description:
This area has become a spot for fly-tipping. Please arrange for it to be cleaned and install a sign stating “No Fly-Tipping.” It is disappointing that this continues to happen regularly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Franklin Place, Lewisham

item.description:

item.title: Flytipping back of Iceland, Corals and Savers Crayford Road, 19th January
item.description:
There is a huge amount of household rubbish behind the shops on Crayford Road. There is broken glass, nappies, food waste. This is from black sacks that have been torn open by the foxes. Please can this be cleared asap as it is getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roman Way, Crayford, Greater London

item.title: Lights stopped working, 19th January
item.description:
Lights don’t work on the first floor public pathway - where the main entrances are. We have elderly residents and they are having difficulty seeing where to walk, especially when using the stairs. Please send an engineer and fix this issue, thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartslock Drive, Greater London
